sentences.en: " Nearly every strained gag depends on the sheer stupidity of its characters. "
sentences.cn: “ 几乎每一处矫揉造作的笑料都来自剧中人物愚蠢十足的所作所为. ”

sentences.en: But as the gag has it, we shouldn't be starting from here.
sentences.cn: 但正如老话所说, 我们不应该从这儿开始.

sentences.en: Each gag was rewarded with a generous belly-laugh.
sentences.cn: 每一次插科打诨都引来一阵开怀大笑。

sentences.en: Gag in fact localized to complexes containing an autophagy protein, LC 3.
sentences.cn: 事实上该蛋白位于含有自噬蛋白LC3的复合物中.

sentences.en: His captors had put a gag of thick leather in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 劫持者用一块厚厚的皮革堵住了他的嘴。

sentences.en: I gagged him with a towel.
sentences.cn: 我用一条毛巾塞住他的嘴。

sentences.en: I'll fire with me pipe! - This gag will burn him up!
sentences.cn: 我会用烟斗点火. - 这个杂耍会把他点着!

sentences.en: Most of the other authors also went along with the gag.
sentences.cn: 其他的大部分作家也纷纷动笔.

sentences.en: Setting a roommate's alarm clock behind an hour is a common gag.
sentences.cn: 把室友的闹钟调回来一小时是唯一普通的把戏.

sentences.en: That gag you pulled was pretty low.
sentences.cn: 你耍的拙劣花招是骗不过人的.

sentences.en: There is always a standing gag in his company.
sentences.cn: 他的连队里一直流传着一句老笑话.

sentences.en: There was this running gag about a penguin ( = they kept telling penguin jokes ).
sentences.cn: 人们不断讲关于一只企鹅的笑话.

sentences.en: There was this running gag about a penguin.
sentences.cn: 人们不断讲关于一只企鹅的笑话

sentences.en: They are going to play a gag on their mom when she comes home.
sentences.cn: 他们打算在他们的妈妈回家时跟她开个玩笑.

sentences.en: They tied him up and put a gag on him.
sentences.cn: 他们把他绑起来并用布堵住了他的嘴.

sentences.en: You think we're going to need stuntman for the shoe gag?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我们需要特技演员穿着塞东西的鞋子 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: [机]塞口物；讨论终结；箝制言论

trans.tran_cn: 塞口物，（牲畜的）口衔，言论限制，恶作剧，张口器
trans.tran_en: A gag is something such as a piece of cloth that is tied around or put inside someone's mouth in order to stop them from speaking

trans.tran_cn: 塞住…的口；钳制…的言论；使窒息
trans.tran_en: If someone gags you, they tie a piece of cloth around your mouth in order to stop you from speaking or shouting

trans.tran_cn: 作呕，窒息，开玩笑，说俏皮话
塞住…的口，抑制言论自由，使窒息，用张口器将嘴张开
